tweets.text: @UnderwaterMedia @JWillson1 @EnvAgency @sascampaigns @theriverstrust @AnglingTrust @YWHelp YW will have a sewer model which can predict frequency and duration of cso spills. If you keep reporting these occurrences they will have to revisit their model to check assumptions as all spills are reported to EA for review against cso consent conditions.

Running my first Twitter training session via @zoom_us  with @EAPensionFund @EnvAgency It's a top-up session & here's some prompts I've given them... Who do you want to reach on Twitter? What do you hope to achieve on Twitter? Let's hope for a smooth internet connection...

@ceadela @Soapy_Wit_Tank @clouds_go_by @tismenic70 @LordOrk @Yeti98_ @teresa_knox @tutty352 @WindowsLake @LansdellMum @ProjectWHYUK @laxidaisy Is it a flow meter that reports back to @EnvAgency

@LakesStiles @Soapy_Wit_Tank @clouds_go_by @tismenic70 @LordOrk @Yeti98_ @teresa_knox @tutty352 @WindowsLake @LansdellMum @ProjectWHYUK @laxidaisy What’s this contraption on a beck above Scawgill Bridge, not near houses? #AugustArchive https://t.co/K1JsBkVZeG

We also had an opportunity to talk of the Afternoon programme on BBC 3 Counties Radio yesterday. If you get chance have a listen it is 3hour 10mins 30secs into the programme. Not comfortable listening for the @EnvAgency 
https://t.co/8lYOfrhcrr

tweets.text: Sarratt Meeting 5 No appearance from the @EnvAgency who sent a woefully inaccurate briefing note on the recent sewage discharges into the @RiverChess. With every change to the regulations they make it easier for water companies to discharge sewage into rivers, should be ashamed.

@Plasmadreamer @JWillson1 @EnvAgency @sascampaigns @theriverstrust @AnglingTrust @YWHelp No blockage, it's what a cso discharge does, been doing it for as long as I can remember, so that will be 30 years. was phoned in 👌
@carlsayerUCL Does the @EnvAgency actually know anything about the environment?
@l_marazzi @renton_phil @EnvAgency @sascampaigns @theriverstrust @AnglingTrust Wetherby STW cso

Some easy things you can look into during Flood Resilience Awareness Week to be more prepared for flooding are to: 
🔵 check your flood risk
🔵 sign up to @EnvAgencyNW flood warnings
🔵 create a flood plan
🔵 create a flood kit 

Give @TheFloodHub a follow for some more tips! https://t.co/up4AhheQHW

We’ll be carrying out tests on the water every 2-3 weeks to monitor the situation. It’s hoped that as the temp drops over the winter, nature will correct the issue for itself. We’ll continue to work with @EnvAgencySE and follow their guidance over the next few months. (2/3)
Shock news. In an attempt to evade speed camera @spacedad1098 is repainting his bike. Again. @EnvAgency are concerned about the environmental impact but are yet to comment.

Wetlands can play a big role in protecting us against the effects of climate change. Great to see @EnvAgency go ahead with their new floods strategy, making more use of natural flood management. Let’s make this happen, creating more wetlands as part of a #greenbluerecovery 💧 💙 https://t.co/f8ENvaXQuk

tweets.text: So very proud to be part of this project! https://t.co/8vTQLLq8Wp

The #FCERMStrategy is now a legally binding document

It informs our future direction to help make millions of homes and businesses more resilient to #Flooding #CoastalErosion and #ClimateChange

tweets.text:
A compelling and devastating round-up of the calamity facing England's rivers and the "Hotbed of mediocrity", that is the @EnvAgency.

Great stuff by @RachSalv https://t.co/d01T1Ts2Ft

@MPSGreenwich @EnvAgency @RSPCA_official @Se28Swan Please protect all wildlife from human persecution. None of our wildlife should be suffering pain & stress at the hands of humans. #badgers #BanSnares #BanTraps #StopTheCull #BanBloodsports

We spend 1000s of days & work on 100s of km of river per year so we see a thing or two!
This experience has shaped our response to @EnvAgency Challenges & Choices
Read it here: https://t.co/GWoflFUR5M
#WTTNews

urls.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19): disposing of waste
urls.description: How to dispose of your personal or business waste, including face coverings, personal protective equipment (PPE) and from lateral flow tests, during the coronavirus pandemic.

tweets.text:
This is devastating.

#PlasticPollution puts our wildlife and environment at risk.

Take simple action:

✅ Always bin disposable face coverings and gloves
♻️ Use reusable face coverings where you can

➡️ https://t.co/pc9WM3wHh4

#KeepItBinIt #RespectProtectEnjoy #coronavirus https://t.co/31PMEjEVPP

tweets.text: @UnderwaterMedia @JWillson1 @EnvAgency @sascampaigns @theriverstrust @AnglingTrust @YWHelp would be better if you reported this to the asset owner to resolve. Possibly a blockage and the sooner you report the quicker it can be resolved.
@UnderwaterMedia @renton_phil @EnvAgency @sascampaigns @theriverstrust @AnglingTrust where is this approximately?
@EnvAgencyMids If you can’t bear the thought of a fallen tree in a river, the prospect of reintroducing beavers must send you into conniptions.

These green strips are the shelter for wildlife and the basis for regeneration.. @NaturalEngland @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency if not us, who? if not now, when? climate and extinction crises are not going away. Own beaver restoration. Let's stop pretending time is on our side. https://t.co/k5gfe2khJk

tweets.text: @Calum92Stevens @Feargal_Sharkey @GeorgeTrefgarne @EnvAgency They’ve no interest in doing it properly it’s a Quango .. there’s no other authority coming up on the rails to take over or challenge them is there

Good old @EnvAgency does it again. Missed its own performance target by nearly 25%.

Aim for 2019 - 20, "Enhance", 2,300 kilometres of rivers, lakes and coastal waters.

Result? Fail!

Question. What exactly do you mean by "enhanced"? How is that defined, who makes that decision? https://t.co/9x3KDtkqDj

@gow_derek What a prospect for @EnvAgency to consider - sturgeon once again spawning on clean gravel-beds, below the crystal-clear Humber tributaries of the Ure, Swale, Ouse, Wharf, Trent, etc.; joining sea lamprey as an increasingly abundant species . . . . What a thought @gow_derek 🙏👍
